passive.name: Deeply Engrossed
passive.description: Greatly increases the wearer's chance of getting attacked and increases CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses Ultimate, receives 1 stack of Firedance, lasting for 2 turns and stacking up to {{2}} time(s). Each stack of Firedance increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attack by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
